question_text:
Question 56
The ___________ is too high for it to be considered _________ .
(A) Fare/Fair  
(B) Fair/ Fare 
(C) Faer/ Fair 
(D) Fare/fare
explanation_text:
Sol. 
Fare : the amount of money you pay to travel by bus, train, taxi etc.
Fair : appropriate and acceptable in a particular situation the fare is high for it to be considered fair.
Here it is clearly seen that we are talking about amount, so first filler should be “fare” and from this option 
B and C are eliminated and second filler is given the sense of right, so it should be “fair”
